CHAT.comment: Chi reads through VHC quickly for review. Mot says of LW , <Just like in school , huh?> Mot and Chi collaborate on content; Chi doesn't really need help with execution , except for being told to put closing. Mot knows a good thing when she sees it , since she insists that Chi's <just like me> comment about eating get into the letter. By the way , would Catherine pay for Chi to go to college AND to move farther away from Logan airport?

u.a: last word not heard because of noise from moving tape recorder
shows cover of book to Chi so she can spell Eric Carle ?
Chi speaks softly and airplane noise makes difficult
cat jumps up next to Chi
MOT points to paper and Chi erases catip because couldn't fit the word caterpillar on the that line .
referring to the catip that Chi first wrote down .
